reason: Short‑term bullish reversal signs: EMA9 crossed above EMA21, MACD histogram turning positive, RSI rising from ~38 to ~45, Bollinger Bands narrowing with price near lower band, stochastic exiting oversold, and a bullish candle at 12:13 after several bearish candles.
